casebody.data:
BROWN
v.
NC DEPT. OF CORRECTION. No. 715P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Marc X. Sneed, Richard J. Votta, Assistant Attorney Generals, for N.C. Dept. of Correction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of December 2005 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31(c)":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
